name: hysterics
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
uncontrolled behaviour or crying, usually caused by extreme fear or sadness: in hysterics Convinced the plane was about to crash, many people were sobbing and in hysterics.
informal uncontrolled laughter: in hysterics He was hilarious - he had us all in hysterics.
